*Drazom is outside. not in the CR Chamber*
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 27, 2000 2:24 PM
Subject: Fight


> (TheCode, that was almost all in one fluent motion, though loooking over
it,
> I can tell how you could get confused, I'll have to watch that.  I'll be
> sending you a private to e-mail somethings I'm having a little trouble
> grasping with your guys and base, like you not posting that much for a
> missile towards the chin of Radistor, which if you did sorry, its just
having
> him grunt and fall over isn't that descriptive of his position))
>
> Oblitertron/Koga Shuko/Hades/Anubis/Nemesis Enforcer/Unitron/Double
> Punch/Manterror/Injector:
>
> The massive Oblitertron's knees almost buckled, yelling in pain from shots
to
> his upper body, his buttocks lightly charred and hurting like Hell.
Raising
> his plasma rifle, he fired off three bolts at Radistor's already damaged
> sternum, simultaneously firing off a continous blast of yellowish red
flames
> at Radistor's face, firing a single optic blast at his knee, his optics'
> color brightening as he fired, slowly dimming back to its regular light as
> the build up of energy left.
> ------------------
> Scattershot sighed, kind of running out of bombs.  -Slag it all to the
Pit!
> If I would've known I'd be dealing with this guy I would've built a
nuclear
> friggin' warhead- taking out two of some of his last charges, he threw
them
> down at Radistor's chest from the side.
> ------------------
> Nemesis Enforcer sighed, getting a little bored, firing off an optic blast
at
> the People's base, a rocket escaping his missile launcher, heading
straight
> for Radistor's middle abdomen area.
> ------------------
> Koga Shuko raised his missile launcher, firing off a rocket at Radistor's
> right knee, firing two optic blasts at the base at the same time.
> ------------------
> Anubis was getting really bored, he'd seen the gestalts, then got bored.
The
> only fun thing was the slight kick he got about shooting someone while
> they're down.  Raising his missile launcher, he fired a rocket off at
> Radistor's left chest.
> "Shuko," he whispered, "do we have to keep this up?" he whined, still
hurting.
>
> "We'll jump the Alliance guy in front of us when rockets are gone." he
> whispered back.
>
> -----------------
> Hades was getting really mad now.  He felt as if death wasn't bending to
his
> will like it was supposed to.  Raising his missile launcher, he fired a
> rocket off at Radistor's chin.
> -----------------
> "The slag with this!" Unitron yelled, firing off his last rocket at the
> People's base tossing the launcher into the air, the launcher disappeared
> into subspace, taking out his two laser rifles, waiting for an
oppertunity.
> -----------------
>
> ===============================
>
> Injector, Manterror, and Double Punch all got out of their repairing units
at
> the same time coincidently, looking around after doing some stretches.
>
> "Dang, I hate this slag." Injector said, leaning against a CR chamber,
> looking through the window.  "Holy slag, the pride of the Predacons has
> spotted something!"
> -----------
> "What do you see, Injector?" Double Punch asked, looking in through the
> window smiling.  "Everyone step back!" he yelled, everyone doing so, he
> stepped back eight feet, raising his pincher.  "FIRE!" he yelled, firing
off
> two missiles at the CR chamber.
> -----------
> Injector sighed, firing off a stinger missile at the chamber
> -----------
> Manterror laughed evily, firing off two ion disks at the middle of the
> chamber.  "Who's CR chamber was that?"
> -----------
> "That fat dragon guy's that we shot at outisde." he said, howles laughter
> echoing through the large room as they left to go find Hell Beast and get
> orders,  leaving Drozom in his CR chamber, with whatever damage he/the
> chamber had taken.
>
